comments.body: Shall we make it a section in `mllib-clustering.md`?
Doc needs update. We assume that the input is a graph with precomputed pairwise similarities/distances.
comments.diffHunk: @@ -0,0 +1,30 @@ +--- +layout: global +title: Clustering - MLlib +displayTitle: MLlib - Power Iteration Clustering +--- + +* Table of contents +{:toc} + + +## Power Iteration Clustering + +Power iteration clustering is a scalable and efficient algorithm for clustering points given pointwise mutual affinity values. Internally the algorithm: + +* computes the Gaussian distance between all pairs of points and represents these distances in an Affinity Matrix

@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@ +--- +layout: global +title: Clustering - MLlib +displayTitle: MLlib - Power Iteration Clustering +--- + +* Table of contents +{:toc} + + +## Power Iteration Clustering + +Power iteration clustering is a scalable and efficient algorithm for clustering points given pointwise mutual affinity values. Internally the algorithm: + +* computes the Gaussian distance between all pairs of points and represents these distances in an Affinity Matrix
